column1: Smoque BBQ////After waiting an hour in line and finally getting our food
column2: my family could not find a place to sit - even though we were asked if were dining in.  So as a last resort
column3: we made our order to-go and drove back to my apartment in Edgewater.  We were surprised on how well the food held up
column4: but I'm sure it could have been better if we have eaten there. Two thumbs up for bad-ass to-go containers!
